text.value: Within 24 hours (check this box if facility delivery)

bind.calculate: if(selected(../fever, 'yes') or selected(../severe_headache, 'yes') or selected(../vaginal_bleeding, 'yes') or selected(../vaginal_discharge, 'yes') or selected(../convulsion, 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Date cannot be in the future and older than a month from today.
Should be between 1500 grams and 5000 grams.
Should be between 35.6 cms and 70 cms.

bind.calculate: if(selected(../infected_umbilical_cord, 'yes') or selected(../b_convulsion, 'yes') or selected(../difficulty_feeding, 'yes') or selected(../vomit, 'yes') or selected(../drowsy, 'yes') or selected(../stiff, 'yes') or selected(../yellow_skin, 'yes') or selected(../b_fever, 'yes') or selected(../blue_skin, 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')

select1.label: What is the outcome for the woman?

input.label: Does the woman have any of the following danger signs?

select1.label: What is the condition of baby?

input.label: Please counsel the family and refer the child to the nearest health center where the baby can be immunized.

select1.label: Were they initiated on breastfeeding within on hour of delivery?

input.label: Does the baby have any of the following danger signs?

select1.label: Are there any other babies to record?

input.label: Lactating mothers need to eat more than usual to feed their baby well. Ask the woman to eat a variety of foods, especially extra fluids, fruits, and vegetables.
For the first 6 months, give the baby breastmilk only.
To keep the baby warm, use kangaroo mother care, wrap the baby with clothes and cover the head, and keep the baby in a warm room.
Always sleep with the baby under a long-lasting insecticide treated net (LLIN).
Keep the baby's umbilical cord clean and dry.
The WHO recommends PNC visits within 24 hours and on 3 days, 7 days, and 6 weeks from date of delivery.

select.label: Which PNC visits have taken place so far?

input.label: Any additional PNC visits, please report the number of visits below to be counted in the total.
To finish, be sure to click the Submit button.
The WHO recommends routine PNC visits at 24 hours, 3 days, 7 days, and 6 weeks from the date of delivery.
Please continue to refer the woman to the health facility at the appropriate time.
Please conduct a danger sign follow-up for the mother in 3 days.
Please conduct a danger sign follow-up for the baby in 3 days.
